content: whether it s a workday picnic in the park or a stroll along the shoreline this lacy lightweight sweater is here for it paired with your favorite jeans and sandals or over a flowy summer dress you can t go wrong **what s included ** 8 page printable pdf instructions for women s sizes xs to 5x size chart and schematic photos for visual aide link to video tutorial **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction of garment ** sweater is worked flat in two panels that are sewn together trim is added at the end **yarn ** comfy sport #2 in whisker 75% pima cotton 25% acrylic 50g/136yds **sizing & yardage ** finished circumference yardage xs - 32 807 s - 35 883 m - 40 1009 l - 43 1084 xl - 48 1210 2x - 52 1312 3x - 54 1413 4x - 60 1514 5x - 65 1640 all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
